[
    name=honey;
    displayName=Honey Jar;
    desc=A sweet delicacy produced by bees;
    unique=false;
    usable=true;

    sprite=items/honey.png;
    type=item;

    targeted=false;

    {
        name=heal;
        value=15;
    }
]

[
    name=stingerSpear;
    displayName=Stinger spear;
    desc=Spear with a bee stinger on the tip.
        Small, but poisons enemies;

    unique=false;
    usable=true;

    type=ability;

    sprite=items/spear.png;

    targeted=true;

    {
        name=damage;
        value=5;
    }

    {
         name=poison;
         value=3;
    }
]

    targeted=true;

        name=damage;
